attributes.action: banks were bailed out - time to bring their call centres to the uk
attributes.additional_details:
We the british people are tired of being called feckless and lazy and demand that the government demands the banks which were a part of the bail out packages which have resulted in cuts to the nation bring their call centres to the uk to enhance the job market for UK citizens.
It is a simple solution to bring down unemployment and ensure some return to mass employment.
